roleset.name: permeate, suffuse, or forcing a liquid to flow over/through something
roleset.note: PERFUSED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from perfused.01-j)

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Sufficient tissue perfusion and oxygenation are vital for all metabolic processes in cells and the major influencing factor of tissue repair and resistance to infectious organisms.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: However, the shape of the canal is such that different parts will perfuse with alcohol quicker than others.

example.name: with arg 0
example.text: Also, it depends on the size of a piece of tissue whether you will perfuse with PFA first.
